The payoff matrix above shows the profits of two firms, Alpha and Beta, that compete against each other. Each firm must decide to set a high or low price. The first numeric entry shows Alpha’s profits; the second entry shows Beta’s profits. Each firm is aware of the information in this payoff matrix.
content.question: Nash equilibrium occurs with which combination of strategies?

choices.label: Both firms charging a low price
Both firms charging a high price
Alpha charging a low price and Beta charging a high price
Alpha charging a high price and Beta charging a low price
There is no equilibrium in this game

content.answer: Both firms charging a low price
